subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Landon Donovan broke the Major League Soccer career goals record, scoring his 135th and 136th regular-season goals in the Los Angeles Galaxy’s 4-1 home win over the Philadelphia Union.
snippet: Landon Donovan broke the Major League Soccer career goals record, scoring his 135th and 136th regular-season goals in the Los Angeles Galaxy’s 4-1 home win over the Philadelphia Union.
